The Story of the Elder Mandāravapuppha
“Having come here from the Tāvatiṃsa heaven,
having taken a coral tree flower,
As he was sitting in concentration,
I held it over his head.
Having held it there for seven days,
I returned to the deva world.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
and the eight liberations as well,
the six supernormal knowledges have been realized,
the Buddha’s instruction has been carried out.”🔽Thus the elder Mandāravapuppha recited these verses.
